attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition against the possible closure of Ysgol Dewi Sant, St.Davids,Pembrokeshire.

Please sign this petition if you don't want to loose a huge part of our local community. Even if you are not local and believe in keeping vital services, please sign and help us to achieve our goal.

Ysgol Dewi Sant is a small secondary school which prides itself as being part of the vital core of the community.

With our diminishing health care services also causing concern in the county, we don't need to also worry about loosing our schools! We need to be able to encourage new families to live in our area to support the local livelihood, otherwise we will be relying too heavily on the tourist industry.

Younger generations will be less likely to come back in years to come if important and integral parts of our community are lost.

Help save our school by signing this petition, thank you!
